channel.title: How to change hotkeys?
channel.description:
Okay, im using project insanity client, and its hotkeys are like for each tab its in order.
So the attack tab is f1, the inventory is f4, and the mage is f7... I want them to be like runescape, so it'll be like attack is f5, inventory is f1, and mage is f4.
Someone help please.

item.title: How to change hotkeys?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Client-sided.
RSApplet.java
Search for:
KeyEvent.VK_F1

Change them there, don’t forget to compile.

Read full topic
